US-401.summary: Create lease quote with valid pricing inputs
US-401.steps:
Given a dealer user
When mileage and duration are provided
Then a quotation is created with monthly rent

Given invalid mileage
When creating a quotation
Then an error message is returned

Given a quotation
When pricing is calculated
Then residual value is included

US-401.summary: Outdated: Quote creation without residual value
US-401.steps: Old pricing flow without residual value

US-402.steps:
Given a quotation
When discount is applied
Then it is accepted automatically

Given a quotation
When discount exceeds threshold
Then approval is required

Given a discount approval
When decision is made
Then audit entry is stored

US-403.steps:
Given a lease application
When credit is approved
Then decision is stored

US-403.summary: Receive rejected credit decision with reason
US-403.steps:
Given a lease application
When credit is rejected
Then reason code is returned

Given a decision
When stored
Then audit trail exists

US-404.steps:
Given customer data
When logs are written
Then PII fields are masked

US-404.summary: Restrict access to sensitive customer fields
US-404.steps:
Given unauthorized user
When accessing PII
Then access is denied

US-405.steps:
Given a quotation
When generating contract
Then PDF pack is created

Given a contract
When signed digitally
Then contract is marked as signed

US-406.steps:
Given an active contract
When mileage is changed
Then pricing is updated

US-407.steps:
Given a signed contract
When invoicing runs
Then first invoice is generated

Given contract duration
When schedule is generated
Then installments are created

US-408.steps:
Given a running contract
When early termination is requested
Then fees are calculated
